sources.title: Best Software with Real-time translation Functionality (2025)
sources.snippet: Google Translate is a versatile, cloud-based translation service offering real-time text, voice, image, and document translation across numerous languages. It supports online and offline use, making language barriers more manageable for communication and learning.

sources.title: WhatsApp adds built-in text translations on iPhone and Android
sources.snippet: WhatsApp has introduced a new built-in translation feature for both iPhone and Android users, enabling real-time message translation within chats, groups, and Channel updates. The feature, rolling out gradually from September 23, 2025, allows users to long-press a message and tap "Translate" to convert the text into their preferred language. Android users initially get support for English, Spanish, Hindi, Portuguese, Russian, and Arabic, with the added ability to enable automatic translation for entire conversations. iPhone users can access translations in over 19 languages from launch. While the feature mirrors existing services like Google's "Tap to Translate," it marks a significant update for WhatsAppâ€™s global audience, enhancing ease of communication across languages. WhatsApp also plans to add more language options in the future.
